title: Cerebro
subtitle: A curated database of Product Management thought leaders.
description: Cerebro is a web application that stores, displays, and verifies a structured dataset of influential people in software product management. The app allows contributors to view, edit, and verify detailed profile data.

title: CalPal Nutrition Calculator
subtitle: Chrome extension for daily nutrition
description: A Chrome extension for calculating daily protein, calories, and macronutrients. Uses Mifflin-St Jeor and Hamwi formulas for accurate calculations.

metrics.impact: Provides a simple, offline-ready tool for nutrition calculations.

title: Kinisi - AI Exercise Program Generator
subtitle: AI-powered personalized exercise program generator.
description: A mobile-responsive web application that builds personalized, adaptive exercise programs using user input from an intake survey and generative AI. It features user authentication, dynamic survey generation, AI-generated assessments, and custom exercise program creation.

metrics.impact: Generates personalized exercise programs to help users build healthy habits.

title: Cerridwen Rules Wizard
subtitle: AI-powered ruleset generator for IDEs
description: A Rails and Windsurf application that guides developers through a wizard to generate personalized AI rulesets for IDEs like Cursor, Windsurf, or GitHub Copilot.

title: AI Rules Database
subtitle: Web crawler and platform for managing coding rulesets.
description: A comprehensive web crawler and AI-powered platform for aggregating, searching, and managing coding rulesets from multiple sources with advanced crawling and indexing capabilities.

metrics.impact: Aggregates and indexes coding rulesets from multiple major sources.
